actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 93-267.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.J. Res 512 passed in lieu.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original joint resolution to provide for a temporary extension of the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of loans and mortgages.

summary.text: Provides for a temporary extension, for thirteen months, of the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of housing loans and mortgages.

titles.title: An original joint resolution to provide for a temporary extension of the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of loans and mortgages.
